name: typedoc-plugin-remark
description: A plugin for TypeDoc ( + typedoc-plugin-markdown ) that enables additional markdown transformations with remark plugins.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.build-and-run: npm run build && npm run pretest
scripts.test:update: npm run build && rm -rf ./test/__snapshots__ && npm test

author: Thomas Grey
